tool_description: Translate text to 100+ languages ​. Fast processing, cost saving. Free up to 100,000 characters per month
name: Text Translator
title: Text Translator

api_list.name: translate
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to translate text from one language to another using the post  method

parameters.name: target_language
parameters.description: Target language, filled with supported language codes such as: **en**, **eu**, **id**, and many others.

parameters.name: source_language
parameters.description:
Source language, filled with supported language codes such as: **en**, **eu**, **id**, and many others.
You can also set the value '**auto**' if you want an API that detects the language automatically

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The field must be filled with text content to be translated, maximum 15,000 characters

utterances.utterance: Translate 'Hello, how are you?' from English to Spanish.
Can you translate 'Good morning' from English to French?
Translate 'Thank you' from English to Japanese.
How do you say 'I love you' in German? Translate it from English.
Translate 'Where is the restroom?' from English to Chinese.
Can you translate 'What time is it?' from English to Russian?
Translate 'How much does this cost?' from English to Italian.
How do you say 'Happy Birthday' in Portuguese? Translate it from English.
Translate 'Can you help me?' from English to Korean.
Can you translate 'Nice to meet you' from English to Arabic?
